I got a macbook pro with intel core duo 2.16 and the cd booted up holding the c button and it is snow leopard and everything works. I burned the disk in disk utilty on my hackintosh, Its a dmg file and my MBP had turned off while doing a system update and would only boot into panic and need to be restarted. Yesterday Tiger and today snow leopard with all the updates. The only mac cd I had was snow leopard 10.6 DL and my superdrive don't read DL disk so I'm glad it worked.

I downloaded this and tried both dmg2img and UltraISO and both told me it was corrupted. I then copied it over to my Mac and it burned with no complaints to DVD and appeared to be OK, but it will not boot on any PC I have... not worth the bother IMHO.
